definitions.body: arrangement, disposition [[תְּכוּנׇתוֹ]] Ez Eze 43:11, i.e. the arrangement of the house (del. Co with LXX codd.)
preparation, [[וְאֵין קֶחֶה לַתְּכוּנׇה]] Na 2:10 and no end to the preparation (i.e. things prepared, supply, store).
fixed place, i.e. dwelling-place, of God (= [[מָכוֹן]]) [[תְּכוּנׇתוֹ]] Job 23:3.
